Subject: Sharing an Oral History: The Art of Verbal Storytelling
Description: We've all been there: this absolutely amazing thing happened to you yesterday and you want to share it with your friends and family. You take a deep breath and begin...only to helplessly watch as the story falls directly on its face. Storytelling is an art, and like any art it takes practice, study, and one of those books where you draw Sparky the turtle on the grid then mail it to Pueblo CO. This panel will basically be the turtle grid.  Speakers include:Jer Lance, Dawn Kuczwara - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
